#summary How to participate in the translation process
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

Here are the steps required to participate in the translation of WS4GL


= Details =

  * Download and install Netbean (Latest version)
  * Checkout the source code in a folder
  * Open the project in Netbeans
  * In the sources of the project, go to org.webcamstudio
  * All Languages.properties files are in there
  * Update the language file
  * Rebuild and test
  * Once everything is working, commit the modification 
  * Important, set a comment saying what has chaged and why


Note:  Make sure that you have the Commiter Access to the repository.  If not, juste send me an email requesting the access and for what use.

Thanks
